description: When pressed, a floating action button can display multiple primary actions that can be performed on a page.

methods.description: Defines methods that can be accessed by the component's reference.

values.name: getElement
values.description: Used to get container element.

values.name: hide
values.description: Used to hide the popup.

values.name: show
values.description: Used to show the popup.

props.description: Defines valid properties in SpeedDial component. In addition to these, all properties of HTMLDivElement can be used in this component.

values.name: buttonClassName
values.description: Style class of the button element.

values.name: buttonStyle
values.description: Inline style of the button element.

values.name: buttonTemplate
values.description: Template of button element.

values.name: direction
values.description: Specifies the opening direction of actions. Valid values are 'up', 'down', 'left', 'right', 'up-left', 'up-right', 'down-left' and 'down-right'

values.name: disabled
values.description: Whether the component is disabled.

values.name: hideIcon
values.description: Hide icon of the button element.

values.name: hideOnClickOutside
values.description: Whether the actions close when clicked outside.

values.name: mask
values.description: Whether to show a mask element behind the speeddial.

values.name: maskClassName
values.description: Style class of the mask element.

values.name: maskStyle
values.description: Inline style of the mask element.

values.name: model
values.description: MenuModel instance to define the action items.

values.name: pt
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

values.name: ptOptions
values.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

values.name: radius
values.description: Radius for *circle types.

values.name: rotateAnimation
values.description: Defined to rotate showIcon when hideIcon is not present.

values.name: showIcon
values.description: Show icon of the button element.

values.name: transitionDelay
values.description: Transition delay step for each action item.

values.name: type
values.description: Specifies the opening type of actions.

values.name: unstyled
values.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

values.name: visible
values.description: Specifies the visibility of the overlay.

callbacks.description: Defines callbacks that determine the behavior of the component based on a given condition or report the actions that the component takes.

values.name: onClick
values.description: Fired when the button element clicked.

values.name: onHide
values.description: Fired when the actions are hidden.

values.name: onShow
values.description: Fired when the actions are visible.

values.name: onVisibleChange
values.description: Fired when the visibility of element changed.

values.name: root
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the root's DOM element.

values.name: button
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the Button component.

values.name: menu
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the menu's DOM element.

values.name: menuitem
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the menu item's DOM element.

values.name: action
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the action's DOM element.

values.name: actionIcon
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the action icon's DOM element.

values.name: mask
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the mask's DOM element.

values.name: hooks
values.description: Used to manage all lifecycle hooks

types.description: Defines types used by properties of the SpeedDial component.

state.description: Defines current inline state in SpeedDial component.

values.name: visible
values.description: Current visible state as a boolean.
